variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: PARTICIPANT ID [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC1
variable.description: Q1. A. Temperature. Room temperature (degrees centigrade) [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC2
variable.description: Q2. B. Tobacco and caffeine use, physical activity, and medication. Have you smoked or used chewing tobacco, nicotine gum or snuff today or do you wear a nicotine patch? [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC3A
variable.description: Q3a. B. Tobacco and caffeine use, physical activity, and medication. What time was it when you last smoked or last used chewing tobacco or snuff? (in hours) [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC3B
variable.description: Q3b. B. Tobacco and caffeine use, physical activity, and medication. What time was it when you last smoked or last used chewing tobacco or snuff? (in minutes) [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC4
variable.description: Q4. B. Tobacco and caffeine use, physical activity, and medication. Have you had any caffeinated beverages, such as coffee, tea, or colas, or any chocolate today? [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC5A
variable.description: Q5a. B. Tobacco and caffeine use, physical activity, and medication. What time was it when you had any caffeinated beverage (tea, cola, coffee, or chocolate)? (in hours) [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC5B
variable.description: Q5b. B. Tobacco and caffeine use, physical activity, and medication. What time was it when you had any caffeinated beverage (tea, cola, coffee, or chocolate)? (in minutes) [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC6
variable.description: Q6. B. Tobacco and caffeine use, physical activity, and medication. Have you participated in any intense physical activity in the past 2 hours? [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC7
variable.description: Q7. B. Tobacco and caffeine use, physical activity, and medication. Do you take any medications for high blood pressure? [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC7A
variable.description: Q7a. B. Tobacco and caffeine use, physical activity, and medication. Have you taken your blood pressure medication in the past 2 hours? [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC8
variable.description: Q8. C. Preliminary measurements. Right arm circumference (cm) [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC9
variable.description: Q9. C. Preliminary measurements. Cuff size: [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC10
variable.description: Q10. C. Preliminary measurements. Heart rate (30 seconds) [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC11A
variable.description: Q11a. C. Preliminary measurements. Time of day: -in hours [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC11B
variable.description: Q11b. C. Preliminary measurements. Time of day: -in minutes [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC12
variable.description: Q12. D. Omron calibration. P-Set Level [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC13
variable.description: Q13. E. First Omron blood pressure measurement. Systolic reading [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC14
variable.description: Q14. E. First Omron blood pressure measurement. Diastolic reading [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC15
variable.description: Q15. E. First Omron blood pressure measurement. Heart rate reading [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC16
variable.description: Q16. F. Second Omron blood pressure measurement. 2nd Systolic reading [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC17
variable.description: Q17. F. Second Omron blood pressure measurement. 2nd Diastolic reading [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC18
variable.description: Q18. F. Second Omron blood pressure measurement. 2nd Heart Rate reading [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC19
variable.description: Q19. G. Computed net average of first and second Omron blood pressure measurements. Computed systolic [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC20
variable.description: Q20. G. Computed net average of first and second Omron blood pressure measurements. Computed diastolic [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPC21
variable.description: Q21. G. Computed net average of first and second Omron blood pressure measurements. Computed heart rate [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: SBPCflag
variable.description: QData record present? [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]

variable.name: VERS
variable.description: FORM VERSION [Visit 1] [Sitting Blood Pressure Form, SBP]
